title: Ticket #6451: Add blahp options for project and wallclock time
description:
Project/account name and wallclock time limit are two common user-settable job properties among batch systems supported by the blahp. They are particularly important for Cobalt, a batch system that we're adding support for. We should give these job properties first-class support in the blahp.

Here are the new proposed names:

  • Project/allocation name
    • Job ad attribute: BatchProject
    • Blahp script command line argument: -A
    • Blahp script variable: $bls_opt_project
  • Job runtime limit (in seconds)
    • Job ad attribute: BatchRuntime
    • Blahp script command line argument: -t
    • Blahp script variable: $bls_opt_runtime
